title: Taric teaser?
body: could this means Taric rework  soon? i hope so!

replies.body: It's the third one from now. Current list of upcoming reworks is Mage>Yorick>Taric>Warwick

It's actually Taric>Mages>Yorick, as of right now.

(https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule)]
Could Yorick potentially slip before the Mages or is the "as of right now" just supposed to mean that Yorick could come later in a worst case scenario?

> [{quoted}](name=Photos of Ghosts,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=E9szWua5,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-03-15T18:54:57.947+0000)
>
> Could Yorick potentially slip before the Mages or is the "as of right now" just supposed to mean that Yorick could come later in a worst case scenario?

Unlikely, no.

What the "order" means is that Yorick is far enough along the production chain that Riot feels comfortable in announcing that they're actively working on it.  Doesn't mean much, though.  Any number of things could happen from now until they release or scrap the project. such as:

* Riot decides another champion is a higher priority.
* Progress isn't being made fast enough on Yorick and Riot decides to "icebox" him.
* Solcrushed or any of the other primaries on Yorick might go insane and delay the project.
* Any other silly reason I can't think of at the moment.

Remember that Fiora's rework was "iceboxed" for nearly a year before last year's surprise release.

Also, since we're seeing much more conversation about the Mage update, it's likely that they will be done in the expected time frame.

Taric is next. Currently, he is scheduled to be out before the next new champ, but after Aurelion Sol.

Considering his hammer was added to the PBE this cycle, I'd be willing to be our Aspect of Tackiness will show up next PBE cycle. I am totally ready for that reveal, too. I'm more excited about this rework than any in memory.

And he still shows the manapot, but doesn't sell it - such a jerk!

Maybe it's a hint that he will have his hammer as an unique item like victors hexcore? Well, probably just overinterpreting this...
**Riot:** We gave up his rework and decide to remove him instead. Our next focus is Teemo
One week... just one more week.. (hopefully).

I'm very excited for the relaunch. He's my favorite character (other than Rammus) and I'm excited to see his essentially "new" skins. With his VU, that means we will see actual new skins for him too! Hopefully he releases by the end of March :0
